subsection.title: Quality Standards
subsection.content: - All touch targets must be at least 44px height/width - Mobile performance must maintain 60fps interactions - Responsive design must work from 320px to large screens - Touch interactions must be intuitive and gesture-friendly - Mobile workflows must be optimized for one-handed use As the mobile UX specialist, ensure SmartPack delivers an exceptional mobile experience that feels native and intuitive on all mobile devices within the 2-day shipping timeline.
